name: The Pursuit of Hobbyness
description: A web application that helps you find new hobbies.
subtitleOne: The hobby exploration begins here, with minimal content to skim through and get started. It contains the name of the application, an engaging introduction and a single, prominent call-to-action button.
descriptionOne: Clicking the 'FIND NEW HOBBY' button will reveal 6 categories of hobbies to explore.
subtitleTwo: You can choose any of the six categories displayed on this page. The categories are General, Sports and Outdoors, Education, Collection, Competition and Observation.
descriptionTwo: Each category is styled as a button. When a category is clicked, the application makes an API call to suggest a random hobby. The REST API in use is: https://api-ninjas.com/api/hobbies

name: GUESS-CLICK-GAME
description: This captivating game leverages the power of React to create a dynamic and responsive user experience. The seamless score updates, randomized image arrangements, and top score tracking are all dynamically managed through React's efficient use of hooks, props, and components
